# Issue: Create Tool

<Intro />

## Tool details
**Tool ID:** `portia:linear::create_issue`

**Tool description:** 
        Creates an issue in Linear, specified by its title, description and team ID.
        Other attributes like project, assignee and/or cycle can also be defined in the
        issue but are not mandatory.
        It returns a json structure with the id and title of the created issue.
    

**Args schema:**
```json
{
  "description": "Input for CreateIssueTool.",
  "properties": {
    "title_name": {
      "description": "title of the issue to be created",
      "title": "Title Name",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "description": {
      "description": "description of the issue to be created",
      "title": "Description",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "team_name": {
      "description": "team name with which the created issue is associated",
      "title": "Team Name",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "project_name": {
      "anyOf": [
        {
          "type": "string"
        },
        {
          "type": "null"
        }
      ],
      "default": null,
      "description": "name of the project with which the created issue is associated",
      "title": "Project Name"
    },
    "assignee_name": {
      "anyOf": [
        {
          "type": "string"
        },
        {
          "type": "null"
        }
      ],
      "default": null,
      "description": "name of the person that will be assigned to the created issue",
      "title": "Assignee Name"
    },
    "cycle_name": {
      "anyOf": [
        {
          "type": "string"
        },
        {
          "type": "null"
        }
      ],
      "default": null,
      "description": "name of the cycle to which the created issue will be assigned.",
      "title": "Cycle Name"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "title_name",
    "description",
    "team_name"
  ],
  "title": "CreateIssueToolSchema",
  "type": "object"
}
```

**Output schema:**
```
('dict', 'A dict that contains the id and title of the issue created.')
```
